summary:
[NO DLC REQUIRED] 
These daggers found within the walls of the Lost City were each forged in the fires of asganoth to serve a holy and deadly purpose.
descriptionHtml:
\'Diilkriid\', the Blade of Light can be found in a Falmer loot chest in Saarthal, guarded by the ancient Draugr who roams those parts. It is extremely effective against the undead and was used by the the tribes of the Lost City to mutilate their corpses, in hopes that they did not return. 

\'Lungahrot\', the Blade of Leeches can be found in an Orcish loot chest in the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary dining hall or an Orcish loot chest in the Ragged Flaggon. It was used by the shaman of the falmer tribes to sacrifice the old and frail, as to please their gods. 

Each dagger has a beautiful custom retexture and special abilities. They can be found in the places specified and can also be spawned or crafted with Elven smithing. I hope you enjoy the new weapons! 

If you like it and or subscribe to it please don\'t forget to leave a positive rating! It is greatly appreicated. 

-Greyclaw 

(The armour in the screenshots is the Black Sacrament Armour - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5696)

(Steam workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=167486342)
author: Greyclaw
